title: CAT ART by Shu Yamamoto @Harbour North
desc: It is our illusion when the main characters from famous paintings such as Mona Lisa, The Gleaners, and Girl with a Pearl Earring turn into cats? Nope, there is absolutely nothing wrong with your eyes! The special invitation from Japanese Yamamoto at Harbour North invite you to have a look at these amazing cat-awesome master pieces!

title: JMA Hong Kong International Jewelry Show
location: Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Center
desc: Jewelry is everything -- at least for those who cherish them the most. Come and visit the JMA Hong Kong International Jewelry Show at Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Center, where you can find the most beautiful and shining treasures of them all.

title: The Extra Ordinary Exhibition - Beyond the Surface
desc: Beyond the surface, when self care becomes an ordinary act of self love, is it still called extra-ordinary? We look forward to seeing you at the Extraordinary Exhibition at Eaton Hong Kong Hotel! Reserve your ticket to this free event now.
